text:
Hi there <@U7SL518D6>...I am facing something a bit similar.. i think?

I am following the CMS Cert Course and cannot get past this error and wondering if you have any experience with this error and how to fix?:

$ npx @HubSpot/create-cms-project test-theme
Error: EPERM: operation not permitted, mkdir 'C:\Users\Jay'
command not found: create-cms-project
You can substitute test-theme for any name you want i just copied what you had.
Sorry about the inconvenience i will alert the academy folks that the video needs some updating

Hi <@U01T53CHBBK>! I had the same error message: that is caused by a policy problem system; i'm a graphic designer and a junior front-end in a software agency: only with the help of a software  engineer i was able to solve the problem.
